data.title: European Women's U
data.text:

First three tournaments U-18; from 2000/01 on, U-19.

All-Time Table Final Tournaments 1998-2025 (24 tournaments) 1998 - 2001: 4 teams (U18) 4 tournaments 2002 - 2024: 8 teams (U19) 21 tournaments NB: in 1998 no final tournament was played. The results of the semifinals and finals are included in the final tournament all-time tables. NB: in 1998 no final tournament was played. The results of the semifinals and finals are included in the final tournament all-time tables.
